content: प्री {vI.v} {c9c} <ab>U.</ab> (प्रीणाति, प्रीणीते, प्रीत) {@--1@} To please, delight, satisfy, gladden; प्रीणातियः सुचरितैः पितरं स पुत्रः <ls>Bh. 2. 68</ls>; सस्नुः पितॄन् पिप्रियुरापगासु <ls>Bk. 3. 38</ls>; <ls n="Bk.">5. 104</ls>; <ls n="Bk.">7. 64.</ls> {@--2@} To be pleased, take delight in; कच्चिन् मनस्ते प्रीणाति वनवासे <ls>Mb.</ls> {@--3@} To act kindly towards, show kindness towards. {@--4@} To be cheerful or gay. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} (प्रीणयति-ते) To please, satisfy &c. {vII.v} {c4c} <ab>A.</ab> (प्रीयते, strictly a passive voice of the root प्री) {@--1@} To be satisfied or pleased, be gratified; प्रकाममप्रीयत यज्वनां प्रियः <ls>Śi. 17</ls>; <ls>R. 15. 30</ls>; <ls n="R.">19. 30</ls>; <ls>Y. 1. 245.</ls> {@--2@} To feel affection for, love. {@--3@} To assent, be satisfied. {vIII.v} {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> To please, gratify &c.
